Package NEXT\Files

Interface summary

FileInterface File interface which is the base for DAM and non-DAM file objects.

Class summary

Fetch The cURL class is a thin wrapper around the procedural interface to cURL provided by PHP.
Exception General file exception
NoStreamException File exception for 'No stream available! File not open?'
AccessException File exception for 'file could not access' which is of user rights issues or the file doesn't even exist
NotFoundException File exception for 'file not found'
File File object
